history.proof: intros Q p q Hred Hcanon HeqP. induction Hred. hauto lq: on use: CombLinear_reduceplus, CombLinear_0, eqp_inv2 unfold: pO.

ctx: intros Q p q Hred Hcanon HeqP.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) p, q : list (Term A n) H : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H0 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q Hcanon : canonical A0 eqA ltM p HeqP : eqP A eqA n q (pO A n) Unable to unify "CombLinear ?M2246 (pO A n)" with "CombLinear Q p".

original: intros Q p q Hred Hcanon HeqP. induction Hred. * apply CombLinear_0. * apply CombLinear_1 with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a q) p). + unfold not. intros. apply H. apply Hred. + auto. + apply IHHred. * apply CombLinear_1 with (pluspf A0 eqA plusA eqA_dec ltM ltM_dec (mults multA a q) p). + unfold not. intros. apply H. apply Hred. + auto. + apply IHHred.
